title: Mechanism insight into the high-efficiency catalytic killing of E. coli by metal–phenolic network as a nanozyme
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15106-15111
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00481G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Weiyun Guo, Chaoyun Wu, Guanghui Li, Yonghui Wang, Shenghua He, Jihong Huang, Xueli Gao, Xiaoyue Yue
CuTA nanozymes with dual functional properties similar to peroxidase-like activity and GSH depletion. CuTA can catalyze the decomposition of H2O2 to hydroxyl radicals (˙OH). CuTA has an excellent antibacterial effect against E. coli.
